text:
Health Practitioner Regulation National Law (Tasmania)

The Health Practitioner Regulation National Law, as in force from time to time, set out in the Schedule to the Health Practitioner National Law Act 2009 of Queensland is applied (with modifications) as a law of Tasmania by the Health Practitioner Regulation National Law (Tasmania) Act 2010 and, as so applying, may be referred to as the Health Practitioner Regulation National Law (Tasmania)

1. Commencement
    The provisions of the Health Practitioner Regulation National Law were applied as a law of Tasmania on 1 July 2010.

2. Further information
    The full text of the Health Practitioner Regulation National Law is set out in the Schedule to the Health Practitioner National Law Act 2009 of Queensland (click on INFORMATION for a link to Queensland legislation). See the Health Practitioner Regulation National Law (Tasmania) Act 2010 for modifications to the Health Practitioner Regulation National Law as it applies in Tasmania.
